body.p:
New markup tables can be created by using two different methods:
You can create an external markup table in SGML-based format and import it into .
Within , you can use the Markup Table Properties window to create a new markup table.

Creating a new markup table is similar to changing an existing markup table. Therefore, see for the details and advantages of both methods. Note that it is often more practical to modify a copy of an existing markup table.
